content: gauge 5 5 sts per inch stockinette with size 6 needles but this is not too crucial due to the nature of the ribbing size again ribbing is very forgiving it s meant for average size adult but it will still fit pretty much anyone but you can always go up or down a needle size if necessary abbreviations c2f slide 1 stitch onto a cable needle hold it front knit the next 1 stitch knit the stitch from the cable needle c2f slide 1 stitch onto a cable needle hold it front purl the next 1 stitch knit the stitch from the cable needle c2b slide 1 stitch onto a cable needle hold it back knit the next 1 stitch knit the stitch from the cable needle this hat was created while watching hours c2b slide 1 stitch onto a cable needle hold it back knit and hours of the west wing with my boyfriend i was the next 1 stitch purl the stitch from the cable needle rm remove marker never a fan of the show during its run but once i got slm slide marker suckered into watching it i was hooked many hours k2tog knit two stitches together left slanting decrease in november 2007 were in fact spent watching the k1 tbl knit one stitch through back loop show while knitting and this is one of the outcomes and the name of the hat derives from one of let s get it started the characters from the show c j claudia jean cast on 120 stitches on smaller circular join carefully cregg no the hat isn t inspired by the character but without twisting the stitches place a marker to the conception and actual creation of the hat indicate beginning of the round happened while i was watching cj-heavy episodes so it got stuck from that point on or maybe i m just ribbed cuff 2x2 ribbing making this up you ll never know k1 repeat p2 k2 until 3 sts remain p2 k1 for about 5 row or until desired length this is a simple ribbed hat with little trellis detail toward bottom it is very gender-neutral design and because of the ribbed body it also fits most people s head without having to be so exact materials needed approx 130 yds of worsted weight wool i used one full skein and a wee left over of elann peruvian highland wool in oatmeal heather 6 stitch markers it helps to have one of them be distinctive to show the beginning of the round cable needle size 4 3 5 mm 16 inch circular size 6 4 mm 16 inch circular size 6 4 mm double pointed needles tapestry or yarn needle cid 1  1 c l a u d i a trellis pattern this may see a bit of the round keep in mind all your purls will be complicated with knits and purls mixed in but just purled and knit stitches will be
